column7:
I apparently wanted to relive the time I recorded Fallout 2 as a "hurr-durr" class. Man, I'm fucking stupid.

- Broadcasted on February 25, 2016. -
http://www.hitbox.tv/grimith

51:25 to 56:05 is one of the best moments I've ever had in Daggerfall.

- Broadcasted on December 15, 2016. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

We abandon one quest to pursue several more. Of course, I end up in a dungeon again. But, this time, I bite off more than I desire...

- Broadcasted on December 19, 2016. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

Welcome to my nightmare.

- Broadcasted on December 19, 2016. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

Actually, welcome to my night terror.

- Broadcasted on December 19, 2016. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

These dungeons, man. They are both fascinating and horrifying. But I love this game ever so.

- Broadcasted on January 2, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

I really do love this game. No matter the quirks. No matter the fuckery. EVERY VIDEO OF THIS SERIES HAS BEEN SOMETHING NEW AND FUN. It's a gift that keeps on giving.

- Broadcasted on January 9, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

It's another beautiful day in this game, complete with dungeon delving and character advancement.

- Broadcasted on January 16, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

The YouTube thumbnail accurately summarizes what transpires during this entire series. It's NEVER a dull session in Daggerfall.

- Broadcasted on January 16, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

I start on the main quest line. It involves lots of undead - because, well, of course it fucking does. But Ersilia's not who she used to be. She's prepared for... almost any challenge.

- Broadcasted on February 6, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

Let's keep cracking on these main quests while a cozy fireplace blazes above my head.
NOTE: The audio quality here is lower than usual. I've been fiddling with software to stress-test various settings.

- Broadcasted on February 13, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

Everything's really coming together this run. But that's really to be expected at this point, right? I've poured a lot of fucking time into this Linguist playthrough. Ersilia SHOULD be ballin'.
NOTE: The audio quality here is lower than usual. I've been fiddling with software to stress-test various settings.

- Broadcasted on February 13, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

The Mages Guild disappoints, but Direnni Tower does not.

- Broadcasted on March 23, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

We don't quite accomplish what I intended, but we manage. Daggerfall Alzheimers often kicks in for the Reluctant Sage of Daggerfall.

- Broadcasted on March 27, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

WARNING: Gameplay doesn't start until around 27:00. Why? Check around 5:30 for hot plastic stripping action.

- Broadcasted on March 31, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith

And so the grand tale of Ersilia Melchor finally comes to a close. The Linguist-turned-Fame Monster spends the rest of her days writing and killing numerous assassins. Some hate her. Many fear her. But EVERYONE knows of her.

- Broadcasted on April 17, 2017. -
https://beam.pro/Grimith
